dt: {bc}something set up as an object or end to be {d_link|attained|attain} {bc}{sx|intention||}
{bc}a subject under discussion or an action in course of execution

pt: {sc}intention{/sc} {sc}intent{/sc} {sc}purpose{/sc} {sc}design{/sc} {sc}aim{/sc} {sc}end{/sc} {sc}object{/sc} {sc}objective{/sc} {sc}goal{/sc} mean what one intends to accomplish or attain. {sc}intention{/sc} implies little more than what one has in mind to do or bring about.
{sc}intent{/sc} suggests clearer formulation or greater deliberateness.

pt.t: being successful was her {it}purpose{/it} in life

pt: {sc}design{/sc} implies a more carefully calculated plan.

pt.t: the order of events came by accident, not {it}design{/it}

pt: {sc}aim{/sc} adds to these implications of effort directed toward attaining or accomplishing.

pt.t: her {it}aim{/it} was to raise film to an art form

pt: {sc}end{/sc} stresses the intended effect of action often in distinction or contrast to the action or means as such.

pt.t: willing to use any means to achieve his {it}end{/it}

pt: {sc}object{/sc} may equal {sc}end{/sc} but more often applies to a more individually determined wish or need.

pt.t: his constant {it}object{/it} was the achievement of pleasure

pt: {sc}objective{/sc} implies something tangible and immediately attainable.

pt.t: their {it}objective{/it} is to seize the oil fields

pt: {sc}goal{/sc} suggests something attained only by prolonged effort and hardship.

quotes.t: Shocking as it is, more than a month after the hurricane hit, New Orleans is still, for all practical {qword}purposes{/qword}, a ghost town.
His {qword}purpose{/qword} is to realize himself, to live the fullest possible life, and he is responsible for this, like all men, regardless of how society treats him.

But wartime wage and price controls prevented companies from competing for the available talent by means of increased salaries. They had to compete with fringe benefits instead, and free health insurance was tailor-made for this {qword}purpose{/qword}.
By the time … American aid began pouring in, to all intents and {qword}purposes{/qword} the war had already been lost.

et: Middle English {it}purpos{/it}, from Anglo-French, from {it}purposer{/it} to intend, propose, from Latin {it}proponere{/it} (perfect indicative {it}proposui{/it}) to propose {ma}{mat|propound|}{/ma}
shortdef: something set up as an object or end to be attained : intention
a subject under discussion or an action in course of execution

quotes.t: I have not {qword}purposed{/qword} to misrepresent this boy in any way, for what little indignation he excited in me soon passed and left nothing behind it but compassion.
The child then explained that they had left the races on the first day, and were travelling to the next town on that road, where they {qword}purposed{/qword} to spend the night.

shortdef: to propose as an aim to oneself
suited for many purposes or uses

dt: {bc}a purpose usually unintentionally contrary to another purpose of oneself or of someone or something else

dt.t: the two were always working at {wi}cross-purposes{/wi}

shortdef: a purpose usually unintentionally contrary to another purpose of oneself or of someone or something else —usually used in plural

dt: {bc}having breed characteristics that serve two purposes

dt.t: {wi}dual-purpose{/wi} cattle that supply milk and meat

shortdef: having breed characteristics that serve two purposes

dt: {bc}suitable to be used for two or more basic purposes

shortdef: suitable to be used for two or more basic purposes

dt: {bc}a corporate shell {dx_def}see {dxt|shell:1||11}{/dx_def} set up by investors for the sole purpose of raising money through an initial public offering to acquire another business yet to be determined {bc}{sx|blank check company||}

shortdef: a corporate shell set up by investors for the sole purpose of raising money through an initial public offering to acquire another business yet to be determined : blank check company — abbreviation SPAC

dt: {bc}a more meaningful reason to live, work, etc.

dt.t: He was searching for {it}a higher purpose{/it}.

shortdef: a more meaningful reason to live, work, etc.
